CustomField.formula:
IF( (LimitsDmlStatementsUsed__c / LimitsDmlStatementsMax__c * 100) >= 90, "⛔", IF( (LimitsDmlStatementsUsed__c / LimitsDmlStatementsMax__c * 100) < 90 && (LimitsDmlStatementsUsed__c / LimitsDmlStatementsMax__c * 100) >= 80, "⚠️", "✅" ) ) + ' ' +
TEXT(LimitsDmlStatementsUsed__c) + ' / ' + TEXT(LimitsDmlStatementsMax__c) + ' (' + TEXT(ROUND(LimitsDmlStatementsUsed__c / LimitsDmlStatementsMax__c * 100, 2)) + '%)'
CustomField.label: DML Statements
